languages.text: Под предводительством сестры Ардженты разведчики сложили поминальные огни. Старые железные бочки и контейнеры для малых грузов заменили храмовые жаровни. В неровном, но теплом свете, озаряющим лица, люди слушали сестру, певучим голосом читающую молитву о погибших. Взгляды, испуганные и усталые, постепенно светлели. Словами сестры к выжившим нисходило понимание, что смерть всегда ходит за человеком след в след, но есть участь выше смерти. Вот о чем надо помнить. Вот за что надо держаться.

traits.locale_text: Под предводительством сестры Ардженты скауты сложили поминальные огни. Старые железные бочки и контейнеры для малых грузов заменили храмовые жаровни. В неровном, но теплом свете, озаряющим лица, люди слушали сестру, певучим голосом читающую молитву о погибших. Взгляды, испуганные и усталые, постепенно светлели. Словами сестры Сороритас к скаутам нисходило понимание, что смерть всегда ходит за человеком след в след, но есть участь выше смерти. Вот о чем надо помнить. Вот за что надо держаться.

languages.text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

В неровном, но теплом свете, озаряющим лица, люди слушали сестру, певучим голосом читающую молитву о погибших. Взгляды, испуганные и усталые, постепенно светлели. languages.text: Liderados por la hermana Argenta, los exploradores construyeron las piras funerarias. Usaron viejos barriles de metal y pequeños contenedores de carga a modo de braseros de templo. Acompañados de su luz tenue pero cálida, los exploradores escucharon a la hermana cantar una plegaria por los difuntos. Poco a poco, sus ojos aterrados se iluminaron. Escuchando las palabras de la hermana, los supervivientes comprendieron que, aunque la muerte nos llega a todos, hay un destino superior y no debían olvidarlo. Es su razón para continuar.
languages.original_text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

Usaron viejos barriles de metal y pequeños contenedores de carga a modo de braseros de templo. Acompañados de su luz tenue pero cálida, los exploradores escucharon a la hermana cantar una plegaria por los difuntos. Poco a poco, sus ojos aterrados se iluminaron. Escuchando las palabras de la hermana, los supervivientes comprendieron que, aunque la muerte nos llega a todos, hay un destino superior y no debían olvidarlo. Es su razón para continuar.

languages.text: 在阿洁塔修女带领下，士兵们搭起了用来举行葬礼的火堆。大家用废旧的金属桶与小型海运集装箱充当神殿的火盆。温暖的火光摇曳着，照亮了大家的脸庞，所有人都在聆听阿洁塔修女为使者颂唱者祷词。士兵们惊恐、疲惫的目光渐渐明亮起来。众人听着修女的颂唱，慢慢地坚定了决心。尽管每个人都难逃一死，但每个人都有着比死亡更加高尚的命运。每个人都应该时刻铭记这一点，因为这就是继续前进下去的理由。
languages.original_text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

languages.text: シスター・アルジェンタに率いられた偵察部隊は、葬儀用の火葬場を作った。古い金属製の樽や小さな輸送用コンテナが祠の火鉢として使われた。ゆらゆらと温かい光が顔を照らす中、偵察兵達はシスターが亡くなった者達へ捧げる祈りの詠唱に耳を傾ける。聞くもののの恐怖と疲れに満ちた視線が少しずつ明るくなる。シスターの言葉を聞いて、生き残った者達は分かり始めた。死はすべての人の足跡に付きまとうが、死よりも崇高な運命がある。それを常に脳裏に刻まなければならない。それこそが先に進む理由なのだ。
languages.original_text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

traits.locale_text: シスター・アルジェンタに率いられた偵察部隊は、葬儀用の火葬場を作った。古い金属製の樽や小さな輸送用コンテナが祠の火鉢として使われた。ゆらゆらと温かい光が顔を照らす中、偵察兵達はシスターが亡くなった者達へ捧げる祈りの詠唱に耳を傾ける。聞くもののの恐怖と疲れに満ちた視線が少しずつ明るくなる。シスターの言葉を聞いて、生き残った者達は分かり始めた。死はすべての人の足跡に付きまとうが、死よりも崇高な運命がある。それを常に脳裏に刻まなければならない。それこそが先に進む理由なのだ。

languages.text: Unter der Führung von Schwester Argenta errichteten die Späher die Scheiterhaufen. Alte Metallfässer und kleine Frachtcontainer dienten als Tempelfeuerschalen. In dem flackernden, aber warmen Licht, das ihre Gesichter erhellte, hörten die Späher zu, wie die Schwester ein Gebet für die Verstorbenen sang. Und mit der Zeit hellte sich auch der verängstigte, erschöpfte Blick der Zuhörer wieder auf. Die Überlebenden hörten die Worte der Schwester und langsam verstanden sie – der Tod folgt allen auf dem Fuße, aber es gibt ein Schicksal, das über dem Tod steht. Das durften sie nie vergessen. Das war der Grund, weiterzumachen.
languages.original_text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

In dem flackernden, aber warmen Licht, das ihre Gesichter erhellte, hörten die Späher zu, wie die Schwester ein Gebet für die Verstorbenen sang. Und mit der Zeit hellte sich auch der verängstigte, erschöpfte Blick der Zuhörer wieder auf. Die Überlebenden hörten die Worte der Schwester und langsam verstanden sie – der Tod folgt allen auf dem Fuße, aber es gibt ein Schicksal, das über dem Tod steht. Das durften sie nie vergessen. Das war der Grund, weiterzumachen.

languages.text: Avec sœur Argenta à la tête des opérations, les éclaireurs allumèrent des feux funéraires dans de vieux barils de métal et de petits containers qui faisaient office de braseros. En écoutant la sœur chanter une prière pour les victimes dans la lumière à la fois vacillante et chaude des flammes, leurs regards las et terrifiés s'illuminèrent peu à peu. Les paroles d'Argenta leur rappelèrent que même si la mort suivait les pas de tous, un destin plus éminent les attendait. Ils ne devaient jamais l'oublier, car c'était dans cette conviction qu'ils puiseraient la force de continuer.
languages.original_text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

Ils ne devaient jamais l'oublier, car c'était dans cette conviction qu'ils puiseraient la force de continuer.

languages.text: Birimler, Rahibe Argenta önderliğinde cenaze ateşi inşa etti. Eski metal variller ve küçük nakliye konteynerleri, tapınak maltızı işlevi görüyordu. Dalgalanan ancak iç ısıtan bu ışık, keşif erlerinin yüzlerini hafifçe aydınlatıyordu. Erler, düşen yoldaşları için rahibenin duasına kulak verdiler. Dinleyicilerin ürkmüş ve yorgun simaları, anbean aydınlanıyordu. Rahibenin sözlerini işiten sağ kalanlar bir şeyin farkına vardı: Ölüm, bir gölge misali herkesin peşindeydi ancak ölümden daha üstün bir kader mevcuttu. Bunu kimse unutmamalıydı ve bu, devam etmek için yeterli bir nedendi.
languages.original_text: Led by Sister Argenta, the scouts built the funeral pyres. Old metal barrels and small shipping containers served as temple braziers. In the wavering but warm light illuminating their faces, the scouts listened as the sister sang a prayer for the departed. Little by little, the listeners' terrified, weary gazes brightened. As they heard the sister's words, understanding dawned on the survivors — death dogged the footsteps of everyone, but there is a destiny higher than death. They should always remember that. That is the reason to keep going.

Dinleyicilerin ürkmüş ve yorgun simaları, anbean aydınlanıyordu.
